items.name: Göreme National Park and the Rock Sites of Cappadocia
items.description: Volcanic landscape with rock-cut sanctuaries and underground settlements on the UNESCO World Heritage List.

items.name: Historic Areas of Istanbul
items.description: Historic peninsula including major monuments from Byzantine and Ottoman periods, UNESCO-listed.

items.name: Taj Mahal
items.description: 17th-century mausoleum in Agra, UNESCO World Heritage List.

items.name: Galápagos Islands
items.description: Oceanic archipelago notable for endemic species and conservation significance, UNESCO-listed.

items.name: Great Barrier Reef
items.description: Largest coral reef ecosystem, UNESCO World Heritage List.

items.name: Serengeti National Park
items.description: Savannah ecosystem known for annual migration and biodiversity, UNESCO-listed.

items.name: Machu Picchu
items.description: Inca sanctuary in the Andes; UNESCO World Heritage property.

items.name: Pyramids of Giza (Memphis and its Necropolis)
items.description: Ancient Egyptian archaeological area including the Giza pyramids; UNESCO-listed property.

items.name: Stonehenge, Avebury and Associated Sites
items.description: Neolithic and Bronze Age ceremonial landscapes inscribed on the UNESCO World Heritage List.

items.name: Venice and its Lagoon
items.description: Historic city and lagoon system; UNESCO World Heritage property.

items.name: Yellowstone National Park
items.description: Geothermal features and ecosystems; UNESCO World Heritage property.

items.name: Angkor
items.description: Archaeological park containing Khmer temples and urban structures; UNESCO-listed.
